articles.content: Based on data compiled by Credible, current mortgage refinance rates held steady from yesterday, with the exception of 30-year refinance rates, which edged back down after opening the week slightly h… [+5198 chars]

articles.title: RIP Pepper the Robot (2014-2020) - Gizmodo

articles.content: Japanese telecom giant SoftBank halted production of Pepper the robot in August of 2020, according to a new report from Reuters. And it seems unlikely that new ones will ever roll off the manufacturi… [+374 chars]
